title: Baker on scourge of discrimination - effect

content.question: The events described in the excerpt contributed most directly to the

choices.label: ratification of the Fifteenth Amendment to the United States Constitution
passage of the Civil Rights Act of 1964
Supreme Court decision in Brown v. Board of Education of Topeka

content.answer: passage of the Civil Rights Act of 1964
